<S%G1161>But<s%> the other <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I am <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G627>defence<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.
